topics.body:
lil b is intentionally bad, he is always off flow and off tempo and his lines are rap stereotipical "first i park my car, then i fuck your bitch"

but thats his character, he tried to paint this incredibly ridiculous rap persona as a way to secretly mock rappers that play these tropes straight, so when you get the joke, you laugh at rappers lile soulja boy hiring him for features.

appart from that he loves his fans, his twitter is basically nothing but him giving shoutout to artists he loves, putting photos of fans and positive quotes.

he has SOME serious songs too.

but his main objective is too push the boundaries of music to the limits so piss off music elitists who want to put borders in what music and what isnt.

so yeah he is basically the best thing ever.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ae1e516368720f7e920c00#post_54ae1e516368720f7e920c00
So he's kind of similar to Kendrick Lamar?
But instead of denouncing the stereotypes he plays them for a joke.

topics.body: [spoiler]It's interesting how in the Super robot wars series of crossover games, Shinji actually gets over his Mental problems somewhat due to the protagonists of the other shows actually giving a shit about his well being.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ae318c63687263600a0e00#post_54ae318c63687263600a0e00
That's all Shinji needs when you get right down to it.
Shinji hates himself because he believes EVERYONE ELSE hates him, hell that's what the finale was all about. Shinji finally understanding that even if the world hates him, his life is worth living.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ae340f63687218e68b0c00#post_54ae340f63687218e68b0c00
The super robot wars series is fueled by Hot blood and Green glowy stuff.

[spoiler]There's this one bit in the first Alpha game where Shinji and the other heroes save Asuka from being eaten by the MP EVAs.[/spoiler]

[spoiler]And there's this bit in the third alpha game where the heroes manage to stop third impact in It's tracks. (And Shinji Finally gets an excuse to get revenge on his asshole of a father afterwards)[/spoiler]
